item.title: How The Lion King turned me into a scientist
item.description:
How "The Lion King" turned me into a scientist

Recently, my therapist asked me to do some homework. She asked me to reflect on the question "what did I want to be when I grew up?" looking as far back into the past as I could remember. A few...
